org.apache.river.test.spec.policyprovider

Class AbstractTestBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.river.qa.harness.QATestEnvironment
      • org.apache.river.test.spec.policyprovider.AbstractTestBase
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Test, TestEnvironment
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DynamicPolicyProviderTestBase, GrantPermissionTest, GrantPermissionTestCase01, PolicyFileProviderTestBase

    public abstract class AbstractTestBase
extends QATestEnvironment
implements Test
    This class is base class for all org.apache.river.test.spec.policyprovider tests. This class sets up the testing environment and has some helper methods.

               throws Exception
        Sets up the testing environment.
        Specified by:
        construct in interface TestEnvironment
        Overrides:
        construct in class QATestEnvironment

        Test to run.

        Exception - if any failure occurs during construct

      • setPolicyFile

        protected void setPolicyFile(String newPolicyFile)
                      throws TestException
        Reset java.security.policy to new policy file.
        Parameters:
        newPolicyFile - name of new policy file.
        Throws:
        TestException - if failed

      • loadClasses

        protected void loadClasses()
                    throws TestException
        Create class loaders then load classes from qa1.jar file using system class loader and load classes from qa1-policy-provider.jar file using PreferredClassLoader and http protocol. Store class loaders, loaded classes and ProtectionDomains for loaded classes into arrays.
        Throws:
        TestException - if failed

      • str

        protected String str(ProtectionDomain pd)
        Convert ProtectionDomain to string to format log/fail message.
        Parameters:
        pd - ProtectionDomain to be converted.
        Returns:
        string represenation of ProtectionDomain.
